cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on June 15, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3034, A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 79 (Friday, May 7, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. DelBENE:
H.R. 3034.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8
Article 3 Section 1
[Page H2153]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to provide an additional place for holding court for the Western District of Washington, and for other purposes.
